unnormalised: Hey! Any news on Hardik Pandya's injury? Last I heard on 12/05/2024, he was at the NCA in Bengaluru. Hoping he recovers soon, especially with the World Cup coming up. Also, what about Bumrah? Need him firing on all cylinders. Heard a rumour about Jadeja too, minor thing maybe? Update at 17:00 hrs, please? Fingers crossed they are all fit by 20/06/2024. Come on India! #BleedBlue. This is important for the Bharat Army!
normalised: Hey! Any news on Hardik Pandya's injury? Last I heard on twelfth May two thousand and twenty four, he was at the N C A in Bengaluru. Hoping he recovers soon, especially with the World Cup coming up. Also, what about Bumrah? Need him firing on all cylinders. Heard a rumour about Jadeja too, minor thing maybe? Update at five P M, please? Fingers crossed they are all fit by twentieth June two thousand and twenty four. Come on India! hash Bleed Blue. This is important for the Bharat Army!
